actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands now managed by the Bureau of Land Management in the State of California as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates as additions to the National Wilderness Preservation System 81 wilderness areas within the California Desert Conservation Area (CDCA), the Yuma District, and the Bakersfield District of the Bureau of Land Management. States that non-designated areas within the CDCA have been adequately studied for inclusion in the System and are therefore released from otherwise applicable restrictions. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands now managed by the Bureau of Land Management in the State of California as wilderness.
